brief_summary.textblock:
assess the effect of  MedCem MTA as a pulp medicament following pulpotomy in human primary
      molars with carious pulp exposure in comparison to Formocresol.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of MedCem MTA and Formocresol Used in Pulpotomies in Primary Teeth.
clinical_study.condition: Effectiveness of MedCem MTA® in Pulpotomies Primary Teeth

intervention.intervention_name: MedCem MTA  pulpotomies in primary teeth.

clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of MedCem MTA and Formocresol Used in Pulpotomies in Primary Teeth

oversight_info.authority: Ministry of Health - Director General: Israel

primary_outcome.description: No pain, no swelling or sinus tract, no internal root resorption progressing into the bone, no furcation and/or periapical bond destruction.
primary_outcome.measure: Success of MedCem MTA pulpotomy in primary molar

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
